attributes.action: Bring in permits for parent and child spaces for pregnant women until child is 5
attributes.additional_details: Anyone currently parks in these spaces and it is difficult for pregnant women or those with young children to get in and out of the car in normal spaces. I want to prevent those who don’t need to extra space to open to car doors and comfortable get in and out from parking in any parent and child spaces in the same way you can’t park in a disabled space without a permit
attributes.background: To provide free permits to parents to be able to park in parent and child spaces from pregnancy until child is 5

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728595
